extendedInfo.description: With detailed explanatory answers written by certified industry experts, our exam prep bundle is superior in content and UI to more expensive competitors.Your satisfaction is important to us and we have a no questions asked refund policy for all our Android apps. We encourage you to try our application out risk free and let us know by e-mailing info@upwardpro.com if there are any issues.Upward Mobilityâs high value Android CompTIA A+ Bundle for the 220-701 (Essentials) and 220-702 (Practical Application) is a valuable tool to help you achieve CompTIAâs A+ certification. With 380 questions and explanatory answers, this bundle app is designed to help you succeed at a valuable discount.In our module, each question is paired with an explanatory answer and a Key Takeaway. The Key Takeaway is designed to ensure that the crucial learning point of the question is mastered as well as support the answer with important insights on how to practically apply the knowledge in a real world situation so you can be more successful in your career.Topics Covered include:HardwareSecurityNetworkingOperating SystemsWhat is the CompTIA certification?The A+ certification is a widely accepted international, vendor-neutral certification that proves competence in areas such as installation, preventative maintenance, networking, security and troubleshooting.This app is not affiliated with CompTIA.Upward Mobility apps are designed with an exclusive intuitive UI. They provide a Study Mode, where questions are paired with clear explanations and the user can proceed at their own pace, as well as a Test Mode designed to simulate the exam experience, where the user can set question and time restraints and their results are presented to them upon completion in both an aggregate and a question-by-question format.About Upward MobilityUpward Mobility is an independent test preparation and management education apps company that creates high quality material that is witty and engaging, perfect for on-the-go students and ambitious professionals. All of our content is developed exclusively for Upward Mobility by subject matter expert writers and undergoes a thorough review process.Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and if you have any questions or comments or are unsatisfied with our products in any way, please contact us at info@upwardpro.com and we will do our best to help you.We are a double bottom line company that is committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries to improve their total factor productivity growth.

reviews.title: Great app, one thing
reviews.comment: Operating systems 701 question number 34 does not have a picture attached to help answer it. Other then that this has been a great tool in my quest to get my A+ certification. Thanks a bunch people.
reviews.author: David Spain

reviews.title: Good review
reviews.comment: The questions themselves are useful and relate to the exams, but there are a few problems with the app. Many questions have grammatical errors, which leads me to believe English isn\'t the authors primary language.
reviews.author: Dennis Gareau

reviews.comment: Good study tool. Do not use as your only means for information. Questions are a little easier than a+
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dated and Subjective-like the exam
reviews.comment: Questions are really dated and subjective. One asked what kind of form factor you would recommend for PCI express and the answer was BTX.  I wrote the above prior to the exam and before studying much. It turns out this app is just like the exam. It was good preparation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dated Questions
reviews.comment: First off there is a ton of typos and secondly the info is very old (windows XP) and not enough practice questions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unprofessional application for $7.99
reviews.comment: Really poor wording and questioning.   Some questions are not only wrong but offer the possiblility of multiple correct answers on single choice questions.
reviews.author: Nicholas Desalvo

reviews.comment: I Love These Learning Apps! Its Nice Being Able To Study For The A+ Test, Using My Mobile Phone. This App Is A Must-Have For Any Tech Head!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very useful...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I dont like the update I realy like the last app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Comptia A+ 701-702
reviews.comment: Excellent application!
reviews.author: Jose carrion

reviews.comment: App is overall very good, but I found it much easier than the actual A+. Needs more questions, and needs to cover newer material.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Finished both 701 and 702, alot of questions not covverred in here BUT i have to say it made me more confident to take and pass the exams. THANKs*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Amazing app. Help me pass. Perfect for on the go. Try using this before the test and you surely will pass. I love today I got my A+
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great study aid! Fast response from developer. Used in conjunction with other resources this will help you pass.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Recc. To anyone taking the exam. Definitely study this on the go. Memorize it then use other sources. I used Comptia self study book via Kindle.Passed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app! The only thing missing is the ability to mark items as know from WITHIN the question. Was able to do This on the Palm app. Samsung Epic
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great explanations in study mode, and will definitely make you more confident when it comes to testing. On the bad side it needs more questions
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very useful for studying on the go.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Hope they update the app to the newer test questions. Otherwise its perfect
reviews.author: A Google User
